title: EventBridge Pipes Dynamic Message Group Id
description: Uses EventBridge Pipes to dynamically retrieve and set the message group ID for a SQS FIFO destination queue

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern demonstrates how to use EventBridge rules, EventBridge Pipes and SQS FIFO queues to dynamically retrieve and set a message group ID from the message body for an SQS FIFO queue.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Kurt Tometich
authors.bio: Kurt is a Sr. Solutions Architect based in Colorado who enjoys building lean, mean serverless solutions.
